captions: I saw a boy with a super cool blue shirt with three lines, shorts made of jeans, and green shoes that touch the ground. They looked like those shoes my big brother wears for playing ball!
Oh, I saw a boy! He had a super cool blue Adidas shirt, short jeans, and low-top green sneakers like a froggy! Wait, maybe they weren't really froggy sneakers, but they were awesome!

I saw a lady with short hair tied up like a pony and wearing a little black shirt with tiny sleeves. Her collar looked like a lemon slice. She had mini-yellow pants on, and she looked like a lemon candy!
I saw a lady with a super short ponytail! She had on a teeny black shirt with tiny sleeves, and lemony collars! Her mini pants were as yellow as a banana. She looked like a fun lemonade treat!
I saw a man who looked skinny, wearing a white shirt, black pants, and light blue shoes. He's like a friendly scarecrow with bright sky shoes! He's skinnier than our scarecrow in the garden!
I saw a really skinny man wearing a bright white shirt, super black pants, and sky blue shoes. He's like a tall tower compared to Daddy!
I saw a lady with hair that reaches her shoulders. She's wearing a dress above her knees, all black and white like a cool zebra! It's shorter than Mom's dresses!

I saw a lady with hair that goes down to her shoulders. She's wearing a dress that's up to her knees, like a black and white checkerboard! It's shorter than my big sister's dress, but she looks super pretty!
I saw a lady with hair that reaches her shoulders. She's wearing a dress with black and white patterns that stops just above her knees. It's like a cool chessboard! She looks taller than our teacher!
I saw a boy who's a little chubby, and he's wearing a white T-shirt with a cool pattern on the left side! It's like a secret badge! He's like a funny teddy bear!
I saw a man wearing a short black shirt with a circle design on his chest and black mini pants. His clothes looked like they came from a superhero! He's like a mini Batman!

I saw a man wearing a short black shirt with a cool round design on the front and black mini pants. He looks like a superhero with a special logo on his chest! And his pants are like little ninja pants!
Look, there's a lady in a white dress with black spots! It's like she's got tiny polka dots all over! And guess what? Her dress is all tied up with a shiny gold ribbon! So pretty!

I saw a lady with a fringe and a white dress with black spots, tied up with a shiny gold ribbon. She looked like a princess! She was wearing these glasses that made her eyes big, just like a superhero's glasses! She's even taller than our teacher in class!

Look, there's a girl in a pink shirt with short sleeves, a round neck, and she's wearing mini-green pants and pink shoes! It's like she's ready for a colorful adventure! She's like a little fairy with her magical outfit!

Look, there's a man in a blue T-shirt, khaki shorts, and gray sneakers! He's like a superhero in his cool outfit! His shoes are comfy, just like my favorite teddy bear! And he's way taller than Daddy!
I saw a man! He's wearing a blue shirt, like the sky, and shorts that look like sand. His shoes are gray and comfy. He looks like a superhero! I feel excited!
